programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.desc: Venezuela is famous for its lost worlds, its forbidding mountains, huge swamps, and impenetrable jungles, all seemingly cut off in space and time. Yet each is linked, by the mighty river: the Orinoco, the rumoured route to El Dorado, city of gold.

programme.title: Wildest India: Ganges: River of Life

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: The Tundra: Desert of Ice

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Mount Kenya: African Heart of Ice
programme.desc: Mount Kenya soars over 5km into the air. It is the second highest mountain in Africa. At its summit, temperatures fluctuate from over 30 degrees celsius to below freezing.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia

programme.title: The New Detectives: Blood Money

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Aim
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own fingerprint, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Military Justice
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Burning Evidence
programme.desc: Identifying Burned Remains: It's difficult to have a murder investigation without a body, and burning up the victim is a time-honored method of destroying physical evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Elements Of Murder
programme.desc: There are several things that can suggest murder; jealousy, anger, poison. When everyday substances reveal hidden clues that break a homicide case, those substances become the elements of murder.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Teams are tasked with cooking halibut in seven different ways; a dinner service; an elimination; pianist Stephan Moccio; chef David LeFevre.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must create a dish using potatoes as the key component. The pressure becomes unbearable for one chef, leading to a chaotic dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final ten chefs are surprised when Ramsay brings in his daughter to celebrate her Sweet 16, each chef must create a worthy dish to be served at her party.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: For the chefs' next challenge, Chef Ramsay pits the teams against one another, preparing authentic Chinese dishes as prominent Chinese Chef Shirley Chung is brought in to judge their finished dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All My Children
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: The hunt for an elusive and clever criminal takes Dog through the world of a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well as a group of hostile squatters on government land!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Baby
programme.desc: What's a father to do? When the cops ask Dog for help tracking down a renegade teen with a history of running hard, Baby Lyssa, eight months pregnant and counting, insists on joining the hunt. Can Dog keep his daughter safe and catch his man?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rain Check
programme.desc: For Dog and Beth it's not only another day in paradise, it's their anniversary. Beth is hoping for a romantic dinner with her man, but she knows only too well that for Dog work always comes first.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Love on the Run
programme.desc: Today Dog finds himself looking for more than one fugitive. He starts the day looking for a woman who has skipped out on her court date. But he soon learns that she has teamed up with a woman whose criminal exploits have attracted the local media.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jump Start
programme.desc: Dog gave a break to a young man with a drug problem who promised to enter drug rehab. But this commitment to rehabilitation seems to have ended when he bolted from the car on the way to the drug treatment center and went on the run.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Ice Man
programme.desc: Dog's latest fugitive doesn't think small when it comes to illegal drugs: he was carrying almost a pound of meth when he was arrested. Now he's on the run with his pregnant girlfriend on the high plains of Colorado.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Barbarians At The Gate
programme.desc: Philippine President Duterte has declared war on illegal drugs, but the battle now gets more complicated. In the Muslim-heavy southern regions of the country, ISIS begins to profit off large scale drug trafficking

programme.title: Drug Wars: Morocco Express
programme.desc: Spain has become the gateway for drugs entering Europe, as traffickers take advantage of the proximity between Morocco and Spain. Today, Moroccan hashish is in full harvest and ready for distribution.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Gibraltar Connection
programme.desc: In southern Spain, the port of Algeciras has long served as a major point of entry for European goods. This iconic trading post is now being used as a backdoor to Europe’s major drug markets.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Rise of the Cartel
programme.desc: This season Drug Wars returns to the US, where along the Rio Grande the battle rages between Mexican cartels and the US Border Patrol.

programme.title: Drug Wars: A River Runs Through This
programme.desc: In Texas the Rio Grande is all that separates the US from Mexico. The Border Patrol Riverine Unit’s mission is to guard these waters and their job is getting harder and harder,

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Race is On
programme.desc: In Texas deadly high speed chases are a frequent occurrence between officers of the US Border Patrol and cartel smugglers.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Drug Store Cartels
programme.desc: In Mexico cartels are increasingly turning to the manufacture of prescription drugs, including lab-produced methamphetamines and opioids.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Grave Danger
programme.desc: The Rio Grande City Border Patrol pursues suspects ranging from cartel coyotes and gang members to families escaping persecution back home.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Every Dog Has Its Day
programme.desc: Border Patrol K9 units are highly trained at detecting illicit drugs and human traffic victims, and are key members of US efforts along the border.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Rio Grande Smokescreen
programme.desc: Border Patrol in the Rio Grande Valley is on the hunt for illegal narcotics smuggled over from Mexico

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesn’t get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mess with Texas
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Frankie'd Up Beyond All Recognition
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home. Back in LA, Frankie's wild antics jeopardize a repo and push Lyndah to her breaking...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monumental Changes
programme.desc: Matt and Froy set out to repo a truck from a wealthy Texan, but their mission backfires when the Sheriff arrives with a new arrest warrant that will send Froy away for good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Adapt, Improvise, and Overcome
programme.desc: Lou takes his new guys on their very first repo but, when the debtors attack with chainsaws, Ronnie and Carlos are left to fend for themselves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Deep Dish Disaster
programme.desc: Lou plans an elaborate sting operation to infiltrate a cult, but everything goes awry when the new guys aren't prepared and Matt is left picking up the pieces.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Traffic Jammin'
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Arigato, Mr. Roboto
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Inane Clown Posse
programme.desc: Froy and Matt have to wrangle with some angry clowns when they try to repossess a bouncy castle. Meanwhile, Lou and Sonia lose patience with a debtor over a recycling truck.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doggin' and Draggin'
programme.desc: When Carlos plays a repossession prank that almost lands Matt and Froy in jail, Lou tasks Froy with burying the hatchet.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Raising the Roof
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy deal with an unbalanced debtor who threatens to take down the entire company, while Matt and Ronnie take on children's book vendors who are up to no good.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: All I Got
programme.desc: Gary's secrets are revealed, putting him and Andi at odds once more. The shadow of Aaron's past overwhelms Karen. Danni tries to be there for Zac. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: In Front Of Me
programme.desc: Karen's world is rocked when blood is on her hands. Sabrina is in for a big surprise with one of Maurice's plans. Danni plays "middle-man" to some troubling news. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: To Be Free
programme.desc: Sabrina learns not to judge a book by its cover. Andi discovers an unlikely ally. Danni is excited about her new boy-toy. Karen feels slighted when she's accused of not being truthful. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: The Game: Whip It...Whip It Good
programme.desc: Jason decides to leave a wild Brittany with the ultimate babysitter... Tasha.

programme.title: The Game: Never Surrender!
programme.desc: Malik tries to end things with Parker so he can live an honest life with Jenna, but things don't go exactly as planned.

programme.title: The Game: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: When Tasha finds out her new man has a terminal illness, they spend his final days tackling their bucket lists.

programme.title: The Game: The Right To Choose Episode
programme.desc: After trying unsuccessfully to get pregnant, Melanie and Derwin visit a fertility specialist, but the visit to the fertility specialist reveals more than Melanie bargained for.

programme.title: The Game: Skeletons
programme.desc: In the fifth season premiere, Melanie contends with Derwin's abortion accusation by leading him to believe he was the father of a child she terminated in college.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Return of the Dead: Glove II
programme.desc: PRS returns to the site of one of their most famous cases, Daisytown, PA, where they had discovered a glove print of an old miner that they determined was the spirit of a Great-Grandfather.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Bate Hall Pt 2
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team continue to investigate Macclesfield’s oldest pub and are soon under fire from poltergeist activity. Glen’s scepticism is put fully to the test.

programme.title: Ruthin Pt 1
programme.desc: This old Welsh Castle pushes Yvette’s team of ghost hunters to the limit and at least one of them doesn’t make it to the end…but who? Strange noises and sinister shadows seem to create an atmosphere of foreboding throughout the night.

programme.title: Ruthin Pt 2
programme.desc: The team continue their investigation into Ruthin Castle, as the activity gains momentum one of team is hit hard and has to leave, so the others go in search of whatever is there lurking…all is going well until they find it.

programme.title: Ancient High House
programme.desc: The team are followed around this ancient house said to be the haunt of many long dead spirits. The team are soon put to the test as Gregg feels something is playing with him.

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 1
programme.desc: The upper room of the Leopard Inn are now a set of deserted rooms and corridors that were once a Victorian Hotel, although way past its heyday some of the borders seem to have stayed. This episode sees the team get their most convincing evidence to date.

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 2
programme.desc: The team continue in the abandoned old hotel but something seems to be stalking them. Yvette has a close encounter alone in the corridors with disembodied footsteps walking toward her and aggressive poltergeist activity plagues the rest of the team

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: All That Glitters
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark pose as priests in order to re-open an abandoned church as a shelter when a major fire breaks out in a neighborhood.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Wally
programme.desc: Wally is a hobo and street puppeteer whose caring and goodness have made him an angel without him knowing it.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song of Songs
programme.desc: A struggling pianist tries to start life again after a heart attack.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Night to Remember
programme.desc: High school seniors hope they get the dates they want for prom.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Mother and a Daughter

programme.desc: Danny and Sarah let their past catch up with them, and Caroline and DuPlessis go shopping for lion-prey.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: The drought finally throws up a fire and the wedding turns into a firefight for everyone. The omens are bad.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes and the Trevanians have to decide what future lies ahead of them in these difficult times.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: River of Blood

programme.desc: When the son of a prominent politician is murdered in his basement, Lt. Joe Kenda feels pressure from City Hall to solve the case.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur And The Big Riddle/Double Dare
programme.desc: Alex Trebek lends his voice as gameshow host Alex Lebek in this episode which poses the age-old riddle--is winning really everything? What if your friends dared you to skip homework--and then double dared you to skip school?

programme.title: Arthur: The Pageant Pickle/Some Assembly Required
programme.desc: School is almost out and Arthur can hardly wait for those lazy summer days by Muffy's pool. Nothing could ruin such a happy time of year, except maybe D.W.'s Spring Pageant! And then D.W. can't wait to test out her new play set!

programme.title: Arthur: Carl's Concerto/Too Much of a Good Thing
programme.desc: Carl has agreed to play the accordion for George's puppet show. But his routines are getting in the way of rehearsals. Buster enlists Binky's help to keep him from gorging on delicious Tuvaluna cookies. Will Buster's self-control crumble?

programme.title: Arthur: Desk Wars/Desperately Seeking Stanley
programme.desc: When Mr. Ratburn moves Brain and Arthur away from their usual desks, it sets off a chain reaction resulting in the most explosive desk war in third grade history! And, Arthur is 8-years old now—does he still need his teddy bear?

programme.title: Arthur: Hide And Snake/Muffy's New Best Friend
programme.desc: The kids capture a snake and learn that it's possibly poisonous--after it gets lost in Arthur's house! Why is Muffy interviewing for a new best friend? She and Francine are usually inseparable, but lately it seems they have less in common.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Snow Mystery/Team Trouble
programme.desc: D.W. saves everything. But her most prized possession is a snowball from last winter. But now it’s disappeared! Then, Arthur, Francine, and Buster must do a report on ancient Rome--but can they work as a team to complete the assignment?

programme.title: Arthur: The Agent of Change/D.W. Unties the Knot
programme.desc: The latest animated hit movie about a boy and his truck has left Muffy and Francine disappointed. Why doesn't there seem to be any cool female characters on screen? After watching "The Wedding Channel," D.W. wants to get married!

programme.title: Arthur: The Great MacGrady, Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: When Mrs. MacGrady is diagnosed with cancer, Arthur and his friends all react differently to the news. The kids must learn how to come together to help support each other and Mrs. MacGrady.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Time Trouble/Buster's Amish Mismatch
programme.desc: D.W. is tired of being bossed around all the time and demands to know why she couldn't have been born before Arthur! And during a trip to Amish country, Buster becomes enamored with the simple life and vows to forgo modern conveniences.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Western Allies secure supply routes that will allow them to enter Germany, and the Ardennes counter-offensive fails. The Red Army advances rapidly. The SS implements the Holocaust.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Marines succeed in the "island hopping" strategy against suicidal resistance. The US Navy establishes supremacy, cutting off Japan.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: In 1945, Germany is crumbly on both fronts. The Western Allies cross the Rhine and take most of Germany, while the Red Army quickly advances into Berlin. After Hitler's suicide, Germany surrenders and is divided among the allied powers.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan continues its suicidal resistance, and invading it looks costly. After 2 atomic bombs, the Emperor intervenes and stops the War. Stalin grabs territory in East Asia. The War is over, and the Atomic Era and the Cold War start.

programme.title: The Blitz
programme.desc: The Blitz looks at the build-up to the raids and detailed footage of the destruction that followed. It features interviews from those who lived through it and stories of sadness and bravery, at a time when Britain held strong and swore not to surrender.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Kailani has fallen for Sam, her gay friend's online ex-boyfriend. Sam claims to love Kailani, but has been acting strange since she has tried to meet up with him. Nev and Max investigate. (S6, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jamey and Ari
programme.desc: Jamey fell for Ari online, and he will do anything to meet her, but she will only do it on TV! Nev and Max help Ari share her story, and she hopes Jamey will accept her as she is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Sydney and Ayissha were in an online romance for years before Sydney revealed she is not who she says. But Ayissha still loves her and seeks Nev and Max's help.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After being Catfished by her high school best friend, Larissa turned to her online friend Anthony for support. Feelings between them grew to love but after a few false moves on Anthony's part Larissa is worried he too is lying.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Long Islander Catherine has fallen deeply in love with country boy Graham from Tennessee. She's ready to uproot her life to be a country girl with him, but Nev and Max uncover that Graham's not everything he claims to be.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Who Killed Jane?
programme.desc: Jane Neumann was found dead of a gunshot wound in the basement of her home in Hudson, Wisconsin. Jane's husband Jim originally told police Jane was murdered by an intruder and then later changed his story and said she committed suicide.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Chasing the Barefoot Bandit
programme.desc: A report on Colton Harris-Moore, also known as the “Barefoot Bandit,” because of his habit of committing crimes barefoot and leaving chalk outlines of his feet; and whose exploits included stealing planes, guns, yachts, and escaping to foreign countries.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Sugar Land Conspiracy
programme.desc: In December 2003, the Whitaker family-- Kent, his wife Tricia, and their sons, Bart and Kevin-- returned home from dinner. Upon entering the house, Kevin and Tricia were fatally shot. The investigation revealed that the murders had been planned by Bart.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Ghosts of El Segundo
programme.desc: In July 1957 Richard Phillips and Milton Curtis, two California police officers on a routine stop, were gunned down by a man who had just committed robbery and rape nearby. Investigators searched for over 45 years for the man who murdered two of their own

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Preppy Killer
programme.desc: Robert Chambers speaks out after serving 15 years in prison for the 1986 murder of Jennifer Levin.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Deadly Ride
programme.desc: Jane Mixer, a student at the University of Michigan Law School in March of 1969, had just agreed to get married and had arranged a ride home to tell her parents. Her body was found in a small, rural cemetery just miles from her dorm.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Nerves
programme.desc: Christopher George guest stars in the role of a psychotic ex-convict determined to wreak vengeance on society.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Run for the Money
programme.desc: Guest stars Richard Jaeckel and Herbert Edelman play gangsters who try to get control of all the illegal betting parlors in the country as well as a virtual takeover of all thoroughbred horse racing.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Connection
programme.desc: Jim Phelps and his IMF team are given the assignment of breaking an underworld ring attempting to set up one of the world's largest drug manufacturing plants off the coast of Africa.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Bride
programme.desc: Casey poses as a young peasant girl from Europe imported to be the bride of Joe Corvin, the top man at getting underworld millions into Swiss banks.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Stone Pillow
programme.desc: Guest star Bradford Dillman plays Edison, a former private detective turned extortionist who is blackmailing a powerful crime chief with a roll of film linking him to murder.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Marcos accidentally breaks an Art Show project that Melanie has made. A Park Kid named Myra has decided she doesn't like her name.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Movement - Separation
programme.desc: When some children in the park invite Barney to join them for a race, BJ and Baby Bop decide he'll need their help. They show him several ways to get ready for the big race by warming up and stretching.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Riff can’t find his drumsticks anywhere. Barney helps Baby Bop explore many different jobs.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Baby Brother
programme.desc: Barney reminds Baby Bop and BJ that although babies start out little, they grow fast. Through pretend play, favorite songs and fun games, they learn about the many ways we grow every day.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Day and Night
programme.desc: With a little Barney magic, the children experience the differences between day and night!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Riffs Musical Zoo - Boats
programme.desc: Everyone is excited about an upcoming trip to the zoo. When the trip is postponed, Riff decides to create a musical zoo. He gathers instruments that sound like real animals. Everyone has a wonderful time at Riff's musical zoo.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is surprised to learn that “The Land of Mother Goose” truly exists. Baby Bop catches Barney, BJ, and Riff wrapping a mysterious present in the caboose, she just can’t wait to see what it is.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney and the kids take imaginary trips to different countries with the magical caboose.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Squares, Squares Everywhere
programme.desc: Nick's homework is to find as many squares as he can. It's great fun when Barney and the kids help!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Sis Ducks Out
programme.desc: Big Sis drops some bad news as the guys clash with Carolyn over a carnival unit at an auction in Long Beach. Ton and Allen unearth a Native American tomahawk, a dunk tank and a rare gun that can fire three shots at once.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: To Pawn or Not To Pawn
programme.desc: On the brink of a major decision, Ton and Allen face-off with Carolyn at an auction in Covina. They win a "special effects unit" that contains big machines for crazy stunt work. The guys decide the fate of the shop.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rock and Roll
programme.desc: An auction in Whittier gets ugly when a buyer named Big Dave tries to take it all. After some tough losses, the guys win a state of the art food truck and an off-road rock crawler with dangerous consequences.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Tough as Nails
programme.desc: CJ seeks to disrupt Allen's search for serenity at a storage auction before the guy's head to a live auction to buy and sell. They uncover an unusual Marilyn Monroe statue, an industrial slip n' slide, and a bed of nails.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Win Lose or Joust
programme.desc: Ton and Allen race back from an auction to purchase a rare comic valued at over $100,000. The guys uncover a Samurai sword used for ritual suicide and Allen lives out his childhood fantasy of becoming knight.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.

programme.title: Christmas Matchmakers
programme.desc: Two hard-working executive assistants arrange for their bosses to fall in love during the holidays.

programme.title: Finding Mrs. Claus
programme.desc: When Mrs. Claus (Mira Sorvino) feels neglected by her less than attentive husband (Will Sasso), she goes to Las Vegas to help a little girl with her Christmas wish.

programme.title: The Christmas Switch
programme.desc: Through Eddie's wit and guile, he gives Sam that last night and finally finds the real meaning of Christmas the gambler's way.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Amber is completely done with Matt and starts dating a new guy. Farrah visits Omaha and Sophia expresses her dislike for Deb's fiancé. Taylor surprises Maci and takes her skydiving. (S7, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Amber makes her first public appearance with her new boyfriend. Tyler struggles with Butch's drug use. Farrah and Sophia model at New York fashion week. Ryan continues to stay clean. (S7, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Catelynn removes her birth control and doesn't tell Tyler. Farrah goes on a vacation to Italy. Ryan and Mackenzie have a joint bachelor and bachelorette party. Amber learns she's pregnant. (S7, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Farrah helps Michael plan his proposal. Catelynn freaks out at a photo shoot and Tyler is overwhelmed with launching the fall line. Maci and Taylor celebrate their one-year anniversary. (S7, ep9)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Amber shocks her whole family when she reveals she's pregnant. Bentley turns 9 and Maci allows him to spend time with Ryan, and Deb tries to persuade Sophia to go to her wedding. (S7, ep10)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Ryan is furious at Maci when she shows up late to trick-or-treat. Farrah is shocked when she finds out who Deb invited to her wedding. Catelynn surprises her family with her pregnancy. (S7, ep11)

programme.title: CSI: New York: Vigilante
programme.desc: When a serial rapist is murdered, restrained in the same manner as his victims, the CSIs weigh a feeling of justice against their sense of duty.

programme.title: CSI: New York: The Untouchable
programme.desc: When a conspiracy-obsessed woman is found dead, the CSIs investigate and discover that some of her theories may have had some truth to them.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Do or Die
programme.desc: When a popular student at Manhattan's most elite private school is murdered, the CSIs find themselves in the competitive world of the overprivileged.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Jo balances personal and professional challenges when her adopted daughter, Ellie, is the key witness in a murder investigation.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Nothing for Something
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate a woman's death as the work of a serial killer. Mac reconnects with his first partner after an ex-con begins stalking him.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Kill Cause

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Count Me Out
programme.desc: The investigation of a dead census worker sends the team into a high speed car chase and an explosion that threatens the lives of two CSIs.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Delko for the Defense
programme.desc: Eric Delko returns to Miami as an expert witness for the defense pitting himself against his old friends Horatio and the CSI team.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Show Stopper

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Die By Sword
programme.desc: The bizarre case of a man chopped in half baffles the Horatio and the CSI team, while Natalia's injury puts her and Ryan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Very Scary People: NEW The Firestarter: Chasing a Pyromaniac (Part 1)
programme.desc: A string of horrifying fires plagues California in the Eighties and Nineties, one of them fatally trapping four people inside. Are these infernos accidental or is someone setting them deliberately?

programme.title: Very Scary People: NEW The Firestarter: Chasing a Pyromaniac (Part 2)
programme.desc: A string of horrifying fires plagues California in the Eighties and Nineties, one of them fatally trapping four people inside. Are these infernos accidental or is someone setting them deliberately?

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Season’s Grievings
programme.desc: After a night at karaoke, a nurse vanishes into the frigid Wisconsin winter. Security footage reveals the woman left with a mystery man in a dark jacket.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: White Snow, Red Blood
programme.desc: A young man hacks his father to pieces with a machete before taking off on a deadly shooting spree throughout Anchorage, Alaska.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Slaying Season
programme.desc: When a single mother misses a routine bank run with her sister, panic begins to spread. The family’s nightmare becomes a reality when a passerby finds the woman assaulted and frozen in an alley.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Whose Card Is It Anyway Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Salsa Episode

programme.title: The Exes

programme.title: The Exes

programme.title: The Exes

programme.title: South Park: Conjoined Fetus Lady

programme.title: South Park: The Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The Mexican Staring Frog Of Southern Sri Lanka: After being duped by Stan's Uncle Jimbo, the boys decide to take revenge by making bogus videos of a certain frog. Will Jesus stand for this? (S2, E06)

programme.title: South Park: City on the Edge of Forever
programme.desc: City On The Edge Of Forever: The school bus ends up perched on the edge of a ravine after it crashes in a snowstorm. Must be time for some flashbacks then! Can these memories be trusted? (S2, E07)

programme.title: South Park: Summer Sucks

programme.title: South Park: Chef's Chocolate Salty Balls

programme.title: South Park: Chickenpox
programme.desc: Chickenpox: The boys are sent to Kenny's for the night, so they can all get chickenpox. The boys decide to get even on their parents by hiring a prostitute with mouth herpes to infect them. (S2, E10)

programme.title: South Park: Roger Ebert Should Lay Off the Fatty Foods
programme.desc: Roger Ebert Should Lay Off The Fatty Foods: The boys are taken to the planetarium but Cartman has other ideas and decides to audition to sing the Cheesy Poofs song on their next advert. (S2, E11)

programme.title: South Park: Clubhouses
programme.desc: Clubhouses: Stan and Kyle build a clubhouse, so they can play truth or dare with Wendy and Bebe. Cartman and Kenny decide to build their own rival clubhouse based on The Ewoks Village. (S2, E12)

programme.title: South Park: Cow Days
programme.desc: Cow Days: The boys try to win Terrance and Phillip dolls at the carnival but a dodgy carnie keeps changing the rules - time to call &quot;shenanigans&quot;! Cartman dates Leonardo DiCaprio. (S2, E13)

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a big day, as the team are building Bob’s new workshop at his new yard. Scoop is desperate to get stuck in and beavers about doing everything he can to help. Bob needs some old floorboards collecting from Bobsville, and sends Scoop to pick them up.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s building a ‘drying tunnel’ for drying Annie seaweed. Muck passes Mr Beasley who’s having a spot of bother with his washing. He decides to build Mr Beasley a drying tunnel for his washing.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s renovating a dilapidated old watermill in Sunflower Valley – it’s going to make flour from Farmer Pickles sunflower farm. After checking that it’s safe, Bob realises that one of the millstones has gone missing. How very odd!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr and Mrs Bentley are moving house, and Bob is carrying out a loft conversion at their new home. Mr Bentley greets Bob and his team, then leaves for work. The removal company call to say that they have several staff off with flu.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: A small rural town finds itself in the grip of an infection which send its hosts into a violent, homicidal frenzy.

programme.title: Rawhead Rex

programme.title: The Gate (1987)
programme.desc: The removal of an old tree in Glen's backyard reveals a large and mysterious hole which leads to The Gate – an underground chamber of terrifying demonic evil.

programme.title: Bloodline
programme.desc: From the Producers of 'Us' and The 'Purge', a violent thriller in the vein of 'Dexter'. Evan (Seann William Scott) values family above all else, and anyone who gets between him, his wife, and newborn son learns that the hard way.

programme.title: Jack The Ripper
programme.desc: London, 1888. A young woman plays a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with England's most famous serial killer. Staring: Sonja Gerhardt, Falk Hentschel, Nicholas Farrell

programme.title: Bloodline
programme.desc: From the Producers of 'Us' and The 'Purge', a violent thriller in the vein of 'Dexter'. Evan (Seann William Scott) values family above all else, and anyone who gets between him, his wife, and newborn son learns that the hard way.

programme.title: Shark Attack 3 Megalodon
programme.desc: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon is a “jaws”-dropping action thriller from the director of Kickboxer starring John Barrowman and Jenny McShane. When two researchers discover a colossal shark's tooth off the Mexican coast their worst fears surface.

programme.title: Night Harvest
programme.desc: In 1970s Tennessee, teen runaway Nathan, who has pyrokinesis, must confront a killer scarecrow after his group’s RV breaks down—using his powers to survive with the help of a local farmer.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Van Helsing
programme.desc: England, 1897. Van Helsing receives a letter requesting his urgent assistance in the northern town of Whitby and follows the trail to the coffin of Count Dracula himself. A fresh take on the legend of Dracula through the eyes of his greatest enemy.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E6 - Thank God It's Friday, Again
programme.desc: The crew visits a planet full of happy workers. Soon D'Argo and Zhaan start working and refuse to return to the ship.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E7 - I, E.T.
programme.desc: A peacekeeper beacon goes off and Moya has to land on an alien planet to prevent its signal being intercepted and Moya being discovered.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E8 - That Old Black Magic
programme.desc: Crichton's spirit is captured by Maldis. The sorcerer thrives on vengeance and hate, he brings Crais's spirit down. And the two spirits battle.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E9 - DNA Mad Scientist
programme.desc: A scientist extracts DNA from several of Moya's crew, promising them that he would be able to use it to find the location of their home planets.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E10 - They've Got A Secret
programme.desc: During routine searches for Peacekeeper beacons, D'Argo falls down a chute, destroys a Peacekeeper shield and gets ejected into open space.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E11 - 'Til The Blood Runs Clear
programme.desc: While flying Crichton's ship near a sun with high flare activity, John and Aeryn narrowly avoid getting sucked into an unstable wormhole.
